罄.definition: to use up; to exhaust; empty

罄竹難書.definition: so many that the bamboo slats have been exhausted; innumerable crimes (idiom); see also 罄筆難書|罄笔难书[qing4 bi3 nan2 shu1]

罄筆難書.definition: too numerous to be cited (of atrocities or misdeeds) (idiom); see also 罄竹難書|罄竹难书[qing4 zhu2 nan2 shu1]

罄身兒.definition: erhua variant of 罄身[qing4 shen1]
